t.input.content_placeholder:
Used directly without modification (split by strategy below)
Example:
Hello everyone, today I'll share three study tips.

The first tip is focus training, meditate for 10 minutes daily.

The second tip is active recall, review immediately after learning.
t.input.content_help: Provide your own content for video generation
t.input.title: Title (Optional)

t.voice.title: ğŸ¤ Voice Selection
t.style.workflow_what: Determines how each frame's illustration is generated and its effect (e.g., using FLUX, SD models)
t.style.workflow_how: Place the exported image_xxx.json workflow file(API format) into the workflows/selfhost/ folder (for local ComfyUI) or the workflows/runninghub/ folder (for cloud)
t.style.video_workflow_what: Determines how each frame's video clip is generated and its effect (e.g., using different video generation models)
t.style.video_workflow_how: Place the exported video_xxx.json workflow file(API format) into the workflows/selfhost/ folder (for local ComfyUI) or the workflows/runninghub/ folder (for cloud)
t.style.prompt_prefix_what: Automatically added before all image prompts to control the illustration style uniformly (e.g., cartoon, realistic)
t.style.prompt_prefix_how: Enter style description in the input box below. To save permanently, edit the config.yaml file
t.style.prompt_prefix_placeholder: Enter style prefix (leave empty for config default)
t.style.prompt_prefix_help: This text will be automatically added before all image generation prompts. To permanently change, edit config.yaml
t.style.description_placeholder: Describe the illustration style you want (any language)...
t.style.test_prompt_help: Enter test prompt to preview style effect
t.template.separator_selected: Please select a specific template, not the group header
t.template.what: Controls the visual layout and design style of each frame (title, text, image arrangement)
t.template.how:
Place .html template files in templates/SIZE/ directories (e.g., templates/1080x1920/). Templates are automatically grouped by size. Custom CSS styles are supported.

**Template Naming Convention**

- `static_*.html` â†’ Static style templates (no AI-generated media)
- `image_*.html` â†’ Image generation templates (AI-generated images)
- `video_*.html` â†’ Video generation templates (AI-generated videos)

**Note**

At least one of the following browsers must be installed on your computer for proper operation:
1. Google Chrome (Windows, macOS)
2. Chromium Browser (Linux)
3. Microsoft Edge
t.template.type.static_hint: Uses template's built-in styles, no AI-generated media required. You can customize background images and other parameters in the template.
t.template.type.image_hint: AI automatically generates illustrations matching the narration content. Image size is determined by the template.
t.template.type.video_hint: AI automatically generates video clips matching the narration content. Video size is determined by the template.
t.template.preview_default_text: Artificial intelligence is transforming the way Pixelle.AI creates content, making it easy for everyone to produce professional-grade videos.
t.template.no_templates_with_preview: âš ï¸ No templates available for this type

t.bgm.volume_help: Adjust background music volume (0.0 = muted, 1.0 = original volume)
t.bgm.what: Adds background music to your video, making it more atmospheric and professional
t.bgm.how: Place audio files (MP3/WAV/FLAC, etc.) in the bgm/ folder for automatic detection
